mapper.sql: select logtime, tg, SHUIHAO, dianhao, JIAOLUMEIQI, ZHUANLUMEIQI, DANQI, YANGQI, YAQI, ZHENGQIWAIGONG, MEIQIHUISHOU from nengyuan_day
mapper.insert:
insert into nengyuan_day
logtime, tg, SHUIHAO, dianhao, JIAOLUMEIQI, ZHUANLUMEIQI, DANQI, YANGQI, YAQI, ZHENGQIWAIGONG, MEIQIHUISHOU,
#{logtime}, #{tg}, #{shuihao}, #{dianhao}, #{jiaolumeiqi}, #{zhuanlumeiqi}, #{danqi}, #{yangqi}, #{yaqi}, #{zhengqiwaigong}, #{meiqihuishou},

insert into nengyuan_day(TG,ShuiHao,DianHao,JiaoLuMeiQi,ZhuanLuMeiQi,DanQi,YangQi,YaQi,ZhengQiWaiGong,MeiQiHuiShou,logtime) select ic.value as tg,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_ShuiHao') as ShuiHao ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and (code='TG_DianHao' or code='BXG_DianHao') ) as DianHao ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_JiaoLuMeiQi' ) as JiaoLuMeiQi ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_ZhuanLuMeiQi' ) as ZhuanLuMeiQi ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_DanQi' ) as DanQi ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_YangQi' ) as YangQi ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_YaQi' ) as YaQi ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_ZhengQiWaiGong')-(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_dlgrhzq') as ZhengQiWaiGong ,(select sum(value) from INDICATORVALUES where bizdate=ic.bizdate and code='TG_MeiQiHuiShou' ) as MeiQiHuiShou ,ic.bizdate as logtime from INDICATORVALUES ic where ic.bizdate= #{logtime} and ic.code='C5'
mapper.delete:
delete from mes_nengyuan_day where logtime in
#{logtime}
